desc: Optimized and maintained e-commerce beauty websites, using Shopify.
Developed the internal system for sales report generation and inventory management.
Built a brand-new component design system to suit company's unique business needs.
Built a range of responsive and adaptive websites, participating in all phases of software development life cycle.
Implemented an email service to allow customers to connect with Customer Service team, using PHP.
Built various online stores, extending and customizing Cafe24(Korean e-commerce platform)
Actively participated in brainstorming discussions with marketing and design teams to create effective branding strategies.
Designed various websites for clients in diverse industries such as retail, agriculture, healthcare, education and so on.
Interfaced directly with clients to clarify business requirements and provide design solutions.
